                                                                                                      # Permission.js

                                                                                                      import router from "@/router";

router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
    let tokenStr = localStorage.getItem("token");
    let userInfo = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("userInfo"))

    function noToken() {
        if (to.path == '/login' || to.path == '/addAdmin' || to.path == '/') {
            next();
        } else {
            next({path: '/login'})
        }
    }

    function hasToken() {
        //å»ç™»å½•æ³¨å†Œ
        if (to.path == '/login' || to.path == '/' || to.path == '/addAdmin') {
            if (userInfo.adminId != null) {
                next({path: '/admin'})
            } else if (userInfo.teaId != null) {
                next({path: '/teacher'})
            } else if (userInfo.stuId != null) {
                next({path: '/student'})
            }
        }
        //å»é‡Œå±‚
        else {
            if ((userInfo.adminId != null && to.path.substring(1, 2) == 'a') ||
                (userInfo.teaId != null && to.path.substring(1, 2) == 't') ||
                (userInfo.stuId != null && to.path.substring(1, 2) == 's')) {
                next()
            } else if ((userInfo.adminId != null && to.path.substring(1, 2) != 'a') ||
                (userInfo.teaId != null && to.path.substring(1, 2) !== 't') ||
                (userInfo.stuId != null && to.path.substring(1, 2) !== 's')) {
                next({path: from.path})
            }
        }
    }
    if (tokenStr == null || tokenStr == '') {
        noToken()
    } else if (tokenStr != null && tokenStr != '') {
        hasToken()
    }
})

                                                                                                      # store

                                                                                                      import Vue from 'vue'
import Vuex from 'vuex'

Vue.use(Vuex)

export default new Vuex.Store({
    state: {//è®¾ç½®çŠ¶æ€
        token: localStorage.getItem("token"),
        userInfo: JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("userInfo"))
    },
    getters: {
        getUser: state => {//å¾—åˆ°ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
            return state.userInfo
        },
        getToken: state => {
            return state.token
        }
    },
    mutations: {
        /**
         * å°†tokenå­˜å‚¨åˆ°æµè§ˆå™¨
         * @param state
         * @param token
         * @constructor
         */
        SET_TOKEN: (state, token) => {
            localStorage.setItem("token", token)
            state.token = token;
        },
        /**
         * å­˜å‚¨ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
         * @param state
         * @param userinfo
         * @constructor
         */
        SET_USERINFO: (state, userInfo) => {
            localStorage.setItem("userInfo", JSON.stringify(userInfo))
            state.userInfo = userInfo;
        },
        /**
         * æ¸…é™¤æµè§ˆå™¨ä¸­çš„tokenä¿¡æ¯
         * @param state
         * @constructor
         */
        REMOVE_INFO: (state) => {
            state.token = "";
            state.userInfo = {};
            localStorage.setItem("token", "")
            localStorage.setItem("userInfo", JSON.stringify(""));
        }
    },
    actions: {},
    modules: {}
})

                                                                                                      <template>
  <div class="header">
    <a href="https://gitee.com/cola777jz/mysql-homework"><img src="https://readme-typing-svg.herokuapp.com?font=Agbalumo&amp;color=F7184F&amp;center=true&amp;vCenter=true&amp;width=600&amp;lines=MySQL-Homework;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer" alt="Typing SVG"></a>    <el-button type="success" style="margin-top: 8px" @click="logout" round icon="el-icon-switch-button">é€€å‡ºç™»å½•</el-button>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";
import service from "@/request";
export default {
  name: "Header",
  methods: {
    logout() {
      axios.get(service.baseURL+"/logout", {
        headers: {
          Authorization: this.$store.state.token
        }
      }).then((resp) => {
        if (resp.data.code = '20000') {
          this.$store.commit('REMOVE_INFO')
          this.$router.push('/login')
          this.$message.success(resp.data.msg)
        } else {
          this.$message.error("æ³¨é”€å¤±è´¥")
        }
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>

                                                                                                      <template>
  <el-menu
      default-active="2"
      class="el-menu-vertical-demo"
      @open="handleOpen"
      @close="handleClose"
      background-color="#545c64"
      text-color="#fff"
      :router="true"
      active-text-color="#ffd04b">
    <el-menu-item index="/student/index">
      <i class="el-icon-user"></i>
      <span slot="title">ä¸ªäººä¿¡æ¯</span>
    </el-menu-item>
    <el-menu-item index="/student/majorScore">
      <i class="el-icon-menu"></i>
      <span slot="title">æœ¬ä¸“ä¸šæˆç»©è¡¨</span>
    </el-menu-item>
    <el-menu-item index="/student/chooseCourse">
      <i class="el-icon-school"></i>
      <span slot="title">å­¦ç”Ÿé€‰è¯¾</span>
    </el-menu-item>

    <el-menu-item index="/student/stuMessage" @click="noMsgTip">
      <i class="el-icon-chat-dot-square"></i>
      <span slot="title">
        <span>ç­ä¸»ä»»æ¶ˆæ¯</span>
        <el-badge :value="stuUnreadMsgNum" style="margin-left: 15px"></el-badge>
      </span>
    </el-menu-item>
  </el-menu>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";
import service from "@/request";
export default {
  name: "StuLeftSide",
  data() {
    return {
      stuUnreadMsgNum:''
    }
  },
  created() {

  },
  mounted() {
    // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å
    // 1.åœ¨æ‰§è¡Œå®šæ—¶å™¨å‰å…ˆæ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡è·å–æ¥å£æ•°æ®çš„æ“ä½œå‡½æ•°, å¦åˆ™æ¥å£ä¼š1ç§’é’Ÿåæ‰è°ƒç”¨
    // 2.ä¸ºäº†é¿å…é€€å‡ºå½“å‰é¡µé¢å,åœ¨å…¶ä»–é¡µé¢ä¹Ÿç»§ç»­è°ƒç”¨æ¥å£,é€€å‡ºå‰éœ€è¦æ¸…é™¤å®šæ—¶å™¨.
    this.getStuUnreadNum()
    this.timer = setInterval(() => {
      setTimeout(this.getStuUnreadNum, 0)
    }, 1000*5)//50sæ£€æµ‹ä¸€æ¬¡æœªè¯»æ•°é‡
  },
  methods: {

    noMsgTip(){
      axios.put(service.baseURL+"/stuMessage/hasRead",{
        stuId:this.$store.state.userInfo.stuId
      },{
        headers: {
          Authorization: this.$store.state.token
        }
      }).then((resp) => {
        if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
            this.stuUnreadMsgNum=0+""//ç‚¹å‡»åç½®0
        }
      })
    },

    getStuUnreadNum(){
      axios.get(service.baseURL+"/stuMessage/getStuUnreadNum?stuId="+this.$store.state.userInfo.stuId,{
        headers: {
          Authorization: this.$store.state.token
        }
      }).then((resp)=>{
        if (resp.data.code=='20000'){
            this.stuUnreadMsgNum=resp.data.data+'';//5åˆ†é’ŸåŠ¨æ€è·å–æœªè¯»æ•°
        }
      })
    },

    handleOpen(key, keyPath) {
    },
    handleClose(key, keyPath) {
    },
  },
  beforeDestroy() {
    clearInterval(this.timer);
    this.timer = null;
  }
}
</script>

  min-height: 100%;

  position: fixed;
  width: 200px;
}

<script>
import axios from "axios";
import service from "@/request";

export default {
  name: "Login",
  data() {
    return {
      Msrc: "https://jz-cbq-1311841992.cos.ap-beijing.myqcloud.com/images/login-back.jpg",
      Bsrc: "https://jz-cbq-1311841992.cos.ap-beijing.myqcloud.com/images/jz-logo.png",
      loginForm: {
        id: "",
        password: "",
        state: ""
      },
      options: [{
        value: '1',
        label: 'å­¦ç”Ÿ'
      }, {
        value: '2',
        label: 'ç­ä¸»ä»»'
      }, {
        value: '3',
        label: 'ç®¡ç†å‘˜'
      }],
      rules: {
        id: [
          {required: true, message: 'ç¼–å·ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º', trigger: 'blur'},
        ],
        password: [
          {required: true, message: 'å¯†ç ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º', trigger: 'blur'},
          {min: 6, max: 16, message: 'å¯†ç é•¿åº¦ä¸º 6 åˆ° 16 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur'}
        ],
        state: [
          {required: true, message: 'è¯·é€‰æ‹©èº«ä»½', trigger: 'blur'}
        ]
      },
      ifDisabled: null
    }

  },
  methods: {
    toRegister() {
      this.$router.push('/addAdmin');
    },
    submitForm(loginForm) {
      this.$refs.loginForm.validate((valid) => {
        if (valid) {
          axios.post(service.baseURL + "/login?id=" + this.loginForm.id + "&password=" +
              this.loginForm.password + "&state=" + this.loginForm.state,)
              .then((resp) => {
                if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
                  this.$message.success(resp.data.msg);
                  this.$store.commit('SET_TOKEN', resp.data.data.token)
                  this.$store.commit('SET_USERINFO', resp.data.data.user)
                  if (resp.data.data.state == 'ç®¡ç†å‘˜') {
                    this.ifDisabled = true
                    this.$router.push('/admin')
                  } else if (resp.data.data.state == 'å­¦ç”Ÿ') {
                    this.ifDisabled = true
                    this.$router.push('/student')
                  } else {
                    this.ifDisabled = true
                    this.$router.push('/teacher')
                  }
                  this.$refs['loginForm'].resetFields();
                } else {
                  this.ifDisabled = false
                  this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
                }
              }).catch(() => {
          })
        } else {
          return false;
        }
      })
    },
    resetForm(loginForm) {
      this.$refs.loginForm.resetFields();
    }
  }
}
</script>

        </el-form-item>

        <el-form-item prop="checkPwd">
          <el-input prefix-icon="el-icon-lock" type="password" v-model="registerForm.checkPwd" autocomplete="off"
                    placeholder="è¯·å†æ¬¡è¾“å…¥ç›¸åŒå¯†ç "
                    clearable></el-input>
        </el-form-item>

        <el-form-item prop="adminSecret">
          <el-input prefix-icon="el-icon-lock" v-model="registerForm.adminSecret" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥ç®¡ç†å‘˜å¯†é’¥" clearable></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item>
          <el-button style="width:145px"type="success" @click="submitForm('registerForm')" round>æ³¨å†Œ</el-button>
          <el-button style="width:145px" type="warning" @click="resetForm('registerForm')" round>é‡ç½®</el-button>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item>
          <el-button style="width:300px" round type="danger" @click="toLogin">è¿”å›ç™»å½•</el-button>

<script>
import axios from "axios";
import service from "@/request";

export default {
  name: "Register",
  data() {
    let validateCheckPwd = (rule, value, callback) => {
      if (value === '') {
        callback(new Error('è¯·å†æ¬¡è¾“å…¥ç›¸åŒå¯†ç '));
      } else if (value !== this.registerForm.password) {
        callback(new Error('ä¸¤æ¬¡è¾“å…¥å¯†ç ä¸ä¸€è‡´!'));
      } else {
        callback();
      }
    };
    return {
      registerForm: {
        name: '',
        password: '',
        checkPwd: '',
        adminSecret: '',
      },
      rules: {
        name: [
          {required: true, message: 'å§“åä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º', trigger: 'blur'},
          {min: 2, max: 20, message: 'å§“åé•¿åº¦ä¸º2åˆ°20ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur'}
        ],
        password: [
          {required: true, message: 'å¯†ç ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º', trigger: 'blur'},
          {min: 6, max: 16, message: 'å¯†ç é•¿åº¦ä¸º6åˆ°16ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur'}
        ],
        checkPwd: [
          {required: true, message: 'å¯†ç ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º', trigger: 'blur'},
          {validator: validateCheckPwd, trigger: 'blur'}
        ],
        adminSecret: [
          {required: true, message: 'ç®¡ç†å‘˜å¯†é’¥ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º', trigger: 'blur'}
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  methods: {
    toLogin() {
      this.$router.push('/login')
    },
    submitForm(registerForm) {
      this.$refs.registerForm.validate((valid) => {
        if (valid) {
          axios.post(service.baseURL+"/admin/add?adminSecret=" + this.registerForm.adminSecret, {
                'adminName': this.registerForm.name,
                'adminPwd': this.registerForm.password,
              },
          ).then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.$refs['registerForm'].resetFields();
              this.$message.success(resp.data.msg);
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }

          })
        } else {
          return false;
        }
      });
    },
    resetForm(registerForm) {
      this.$refs.registerForm.resetFields();
    }
  }
}
</script>

                                                                                                      <template>
  <div class="myInfo">

          <el-descriptions-item label="å¯†ç ">{{ userInfo.adminPwd }}</el-descriptions-item>

        </el-descriptions>

            <el-input v-model="editForm.adminName" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥ç®¡ç†å‘˜å§“å"></el-input>

<script>

import axios from "axios";
import service from "@/request";

export default {
  data() {
    let validateCheckPwd = (rule, value, callback) => {
      if (value === '') {
        callback(new Error('è¯·å†æ¬¡è¾“å…¥ç›¸åŒå¯†ç '));
      } else if (value !== this.editForm.adminPwd) {
        callback(new Error('ä¸¤æ¬¡è¾“å…¥å¯†ç ä¸ä¸€è‡´!'));
      } else {
        callback();
      }
    };
    return {
      column: 1,
      editFormVisible: false,
      userInfo: {
        adminId: '',
        adminName: '',
        adminPwd: '',
        createTime: '',
      },
      editForm: {
        adminId: '',
        adminName: '',
        adminPwd: "",
        adminPwd2: "",
        createTime: ''
      },
      editRules: {
        adminName: [
          {required: true, message: "è¯·è¾“å…¥ç®¡ç†å‘˜å§“å", trigger: "blur"}, //éç©ºéªŒè¯
          {min: 2, max: 20, message: 'å§“åé•¿åº¦ä¸º2åˆ°20ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur'}
        ],
        adminPwd: [
          {required: true, message: 'å¯†ç ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º', trigger: 'blur'},
          {min: 6, max: 16, message: 'å¯†ç é•¿åº¦ä¸º6åˆ°16ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur'}
        ],
        adminPwd2: [
          {required: true, message: 'å¯†ç ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º', trigger: 'blur'},
          {validator: validateCheckPwd, trigger: 'blur'}
        ],
      }
    }
  },

  created() {
    this.getAdminInfo()
  },
  methods: {
    getAdminInfo() {
      axios.get(service.baseURL + "/admin/getAdminById?adminId=" + this.$store.state.userInfo.adminId,
          {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          })
          .then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.userInfo = resp.data.data;
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
    },
    openEditAdmin() {
      this.editForm.adminId = this.userInfo.adminId
      this.editForm.adminName = this.userInfo.adminName
      this.editFormVisible = true
    },
    clearEditForm() {
      this.editForm = {}
      this.$set(this.editForm, 'adminName', '')
      this.$refs.editForm.clearValidate()
    },
    cancelEdit() {
      this.editFormVisible = false
      this.clearEditForm()
      this.$message.info("å·²å–æ¶ˆç¼–è¾‘")
    },
    editAdmin() {
      this.$refs.editForm.validate((valid) => {
        if (valid) {//å¦‚æœè¡¨å•çš„å¡«å†™åˆæ³•,å‘é€axiosè¯·æ±‚
          axios.put(service.baseURL + "/admin/editAdmin", this.editForm,
              {
                headers: {
                  Authorization: this.$store.state.token
                }
              })
              .then((resp) => {
                if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
                  this.editFormVisible = false;//ç¼–è¾‘æˆåŠŸå…³é—­è¡¨å•
                  this.clearEditForm()
                  this.getAdminInfo();//åˆ·æ–°è¡¨æ ¼
                  this.$message.success(resp.data.msg);
                } else {
                  this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
                }
              })
        } else {//è¡¨å•éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥
          return false;
        }
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>

                  :value="item.classId">
              </el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="å­¦ç”Ÿå§“å" label-width="150px" prop="stuName">
            <el-input v-model="addStuForm.stuName" autocomplete="off" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥å­¦ç”Ÿå§“å" clearable></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="èº«ä»½è¯" label-width="150px" prop="stuIdCard">
            <el-input v-model="addStuForm.stuIdCard" autocomplete="off" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥èº«ä»½è¯"
                      clearable></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-form>
        <div slot="footer" class="dialog-footer">
          <el-button @click="cancelAdd">å– æ¶ˆ</el-button>
          <el-button type="primary" @click="addStu">ç¡® å®š</el-button>
        </div>
      </el-dialog>
    </div>
    <!--    ç¼–è¾‘å­¦ç”Ÿè¡¨å•-->
    <div class="editStuDialog">
      <el-dialog
          @close="clearEditForm"
          title="ç¼–è¾‘å­¦ç”Ÿ"
          :visible.sync="editFormVisible">
        <el-form :model="editStuForm" :rules="editRules" ref="editStuFormRef">
          <el-form-item label="å­¦å·" label-width="150px" prop="stuId">
            <el-input v-model="editStuForm.stuId" disabled></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="å…¥å­¦å¹´ä»½" label-width="150px" prop="admissionYear">
            <el-input v-model="editStuForm.admissionYear" disabled></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="ä¸“ä¸š" label-width="150px" prop="majorName">
            <el-input v-model="editStuForm.majorName" disabled></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="ç­å·" label-width="150px" prop="classId">
            <el-input v-model="editStuForm.classNo" disabled></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="å­¦ç”Ÿå§“å" label-width="150px" prop="stuName">
            <el-input v-model="editStuForm.stuName" autocomplete="off" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥å­¦ç”Ÿå§“å" clearable></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="èº«ä»½è¯" label-width="150px" prop="stuIdCard">
            <el-input v-model="editStuForm.stuIdCard" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥èº«ä»½è¯" disabled></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-form>
        <div slot="footer" class="dialog-footer">
          <el-button @click="cancelEdit">å– æ¶ˆ</el-button>
          <el-button type="primary" @click="editStu">ç¡® å®š</el-button>
        </div>
      </el-dialog>
    </div>
    <!--        å­¦ç”Ÿæ‰“åˆ†è¡¨å•-->
    <div class="scoreStuDialog">
      <el-dialog
          @close="clearScoreForm"
          title="å­¦ç”Ÿæ‰“åˆ†"
          :visible.sync="scoreFormVisible">

        <el-form :model="scoreStuForm" :rules="scoreRules" ref="scoreStuFormRef">

          <el-form-item label="å­¦å·" label-width="150px" prop="stuId">
            <el-input v-model="scoreStuForm.stuId" disabled></el-input>
          </el-form-item>

          <el-form-item label="å­¦ç”Ÿå§“å" label-width="150px" prop="stuName">
            <el-input v-model="scoreStuForm.stuName" disabled></el-input>
          </el-form-item>

          <el-form-item label="è¯¾ç¨‹" label-width="150px" prop="courseName">
            <el-select v-model="scoreStuForm.courseName" clearable placeholder="è¯·é€‰æ‹©è¯¾ç¨‹" @change="getScore">
              <el-option
                  v-for="item in courseNames"
                  :key="item.courseId"
                  :label="item.courseName"
                  :value="item.courseName">
              </el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>

          <el-form-item label="åˆ†æ•°" label-width="150px" prop="score">
            <el-input v-model="scoreStuForm.score" clearable placeholder="è¯·ç»™äºˆåˆ†æ•°" type="number"></el-input>
          </el-form-item>

        </el-form>

        <div slot="footer" class="dialog-footer">
          <el-button @click="cancelScore">å– æ¶ˆ</el-button>
          <el-button type="primary" @click="scoreStu">ç¡® å®š</el-button>
        </div>

      </el-dialog>
    </div>

    <el-backtop :visibility-height=200>
      <div
          style="{
        height: 100%;
        width: 100%;
        background-color: #f2f5f6;
        box-shadow: 0 0 6px rgba(0,0,0, .30);
        text-align: center;
        line-height: 40px;
        color: #1989fa;
      }">
        â†‘
      </div>
    </el-backtop>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";
import service from "@/request";

export default {
  name: "StuManage",
  data() {
    let nowTime = new Date()
    let nowYear = nowTime.getFullYear();
    let maxYear = nowYear - 1//é»˜è®¤æ˜¯å½“å‰å¹´-1
    let startTime = new Date(nowYear + '-9-01 00:00:00')//ä»Šå¹´9æœˆä»½å¼€å­¦æ—¶é—´
    if (nowTime > startTime) {
      maxYear += 1
    }
    ;
    let checkStuIdCard = (rule, value, callback) => {
      let reg = /^\d{6}(18|19|20)?\d{2}(0[1-9]|1[012])(0[1-9]|[12]\d|3[01])\d{3}(\d|[xX])$/;
      if (!reg.test(value)) {
        return callback(new Error("èº«ä»½è¯æ ¼å¼é”™è¯¯"));
      }
      callback();
    };
    let checkScore = (rule, value, callback) => {
      if (value < 0) {
        return callback(new Error("åˆ†æ•°èŒƒå›´åœ¨0åˆ°100ä¹‹é—´"));
      } else if (value > 100) {
        return callback(new Error("åˆ†æ•°èŒƒå›´åœ¨0åˆ°100ä¹‹é—´"));
      }
      callback();
    };
    return {
      addStuForm: {
        admissionYear: '',
        majorName: '',
        classId: '',
        stuName: '',
        stuIdCard: '',
      },
      editStuForm: {
        stuId: '',
        admissionYear: '',
        majorName: '',//æ”¹
        classNo: '',//æ”¹
        stuName: '',//æ”¹
        stuIdCard: '',
      },
      scoreStuForm: {
        score: '',
        courseName: ''
      },
      courseNames: [],

      pageNum: 1,
      pageSize: 100,
      stuId: '',
      stuName: '',
      className: '',
      total: 0,
      addFormVisible: false,
      editFormVisible: false,
      scoreFormVisible: false,
      stuList: [],
      admissionYears: [{value: '1', label: maxYear}, {value: '2', label: maxYear - 1},
        {value: '3', label: maxYear - 2}, {value: '4', label: maxYear - 3}],
      majorNames: [],
      classNos: [],
      addRules: {
        admissionYear: {required: true, message: "è¯·é€‰æ‹©å…¥å­¦å¹´ä»½", trigger: "blur"}, //éç©ºéªŒè¯,
        majorName: {required: true, message: "è¯·é€‰æ‹©ä¸“ä¸š", trigger: "blur"}, //éç©ºéªŒè¯
        classId: {required: true, message: "è¯·é€‰æ‹©ç­å·", trigger: "blur"}, //éç©ºéªŒè¯
        stuName: [
          {required: true, message: "è¯·è¾“å…¥å­¦ç”Ÿå§“å", trigger: "blur"}, //éç©ºéªŒè¯
          {min: 2, max: 20, message: "å§“åé•¿åº¦ä¸º2åˆ°20ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦", trigger: "blur",}, //è§„åˆ™éªŒè¯
        ],
        stuIdCard: [
          {required: true, message: "è¯·è¾“å…¥èº«ä»½è¯", trigger: "blur"}, //éç©ºéªŒè¯
          {validator: checkStuIdCard, trigger: "blur"},
        ]
      },
      editRules: {
        // majorName: {required: true, message: "è¯·é€‰æ‹©ä¸“ä¸š", trigger: "blur"},
        // classId: {required: true, message: "è¯·é€‰æ‹©ç­å·", trigger: "blur"},
        stuName: [
          {required: true, message: "è¯·è¾“å…¥å­¦ç”Ÿå§“å", trigger: "blur"},
          {min: 2, max: 20, message: "å§“åé•¿åº¦ä¸º2åˆ°20ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦", trigger: "blur"},
        ]
      },
      scoreRules: {
        courseName: {required: true, message: "è¯·é€‰æ‹©è¯¾ç¨‹", trigger: "blur"},
        score: [{required: true, message: "è¯·ç»™äºˆåˆ†æ•°", trigger: "blur"},
          {validator: checkScore, trigger: "blur"}]
      },
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.getStuList();
  },
  methods: {
    scoreStu() {
      this.$refs.scoreStuFormRef.validate((valid) => {
        if (valid) {//å¦‚æœè¡¨å•çš„å¡«å†™åˆæ³•,å‘é€axiosè¯·æ±‚
          axios.put(service.baseURL+"/score/giveNewScore", this.scoreStuForm,
              {
                headers: {
                  Authorization: this.$store.state.token
                }
              })
              .then((resp) => {
                if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
                  this.scoreFormVisible = false;//æ‰“åˆ†æˆåŠŸå…³é—­è¡¨å•
                  this.clearScoreForm()
                  this.getStuList();//åˆ·æ–°è¡¨æ ¼
                  this.$message.success(resp.data.msg);
                } else {
                  this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
                }
              })
        } else {//è¡¨å•éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥
          return false;
        }
      })
    },
    getScore() {
      axios.get(service.baseURL+"/score/getScoreByCourseName?courseName=" + this.scoreStuForm.courseName +
          "&stuId=" + this.scoreStuForm.stuId, {
        headers: {
          Authorization: this.$store.state.token
        }
      }).then((resp) => {
        if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
          if (resp.data.data != null) {
            this.$message.info(this.scoreStuForm.courseName + "æˆç»©ä¸º" + resp.data.data)
          }
        }
      })
    },
    add_Year(stuForm) {//æ–°å¢å­¦ç”Ÿæ—¶æ”¹ä¸“ä¸šé‡æ–°é€‰ç­çº§
      // setTimeout(()=>{
      //   this.addStuForm.classId=''
      // }, 100)
      this.$set(this.addStuForm,'classId','')
      if ((stuForm.majorName!=""&&stuForm.majorName!=undefined)&&(stuForm.admissionYear!=""&&stuForm.admissionYear!=undefined))
      this.getClasses(stuForm)
    },
    add_Major(stuForm) {
      // setTimeout(()=>{
      //   this.addStuForm.classId=''
      // }, 100)
      this.$set(this.addStuForm,'classId','')
      if ((stuForm.majorName!=""&&stuForm.majorName!=undefined)&&(stuForm.admissionYear!=""&&stuForm.admissionYear!=undefined))
      this.getClasses(stuForm)
    },
    getClasses(stuForm) {
      axios.get(service.baseURL+"/class/getClassesByMajorName?majorName=" + stuForm.majorName + "&classYear=" + stuForm.admissionYear,
          {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          })
          .then((resp) => {
            if (resp.code = "20000") {
              this.classNos = resp.data.data
            }
          })
    },
    resetStuList() {
      location.reload();
    },
    searchStuList() {
      this.pageNum = 1
      this.getStuList();
    },
    cancelEdit() {
      this.editFormVisible = false
      this.clearAddForm()
      this.$message.info("å·²å–æ¶ˆç¼–è¾‘")
    },
    cancelAdd() {
      this.addFormVisible = false
      this.classNos=[]
      this.clearAddForm()
      this.$set(this.addStuForm,'classId','')
      this.$message.info("å·²å–æ¶ˆæ–°å¢")
    },
    cancelScore() {
      this.scoreFormVisible = false
      this.clearScoreForm()
      this.$message.info("å·²å–æ¶ˆæ‰“åˆ†")
    },
    delStu(row) {
      this.$confirm(`ç¡®è®¤åˆ é™¤å­¦ç”Ÿï¼š${row.stuName} ï¼Ÿ`, "æç¤º", {
        confirmButtonText: "ç¡®å®š",
        cancelButtonText: "å–æ¶ˆ",
        type: "warning",
        center: true,
      }).then(() => {
        axios.delete(service.baseURL+"/student/delete?stuId=" + row.stuId,
            {
              headers: {
                Authorization: this.$store.state.token
              }
            })
            .then((resp) => {
              if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
                this.getStuList();
                this.$message.success(resp.data.msg)
              } else {
                this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
              }
            })
      }).catch(() => {
        this.$message({
          type: "info",
          message: "å·²å–æ¶ˆåˆ é™¤",
        })
      })
    },
    openStuScore(row) {
      axios.get(service.baseURL+"/student/getByStuId?stuId=" + row.stuId,
          {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          })
          .then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.scoreFormVisible = true;
              this.scoreStuForm = resp.data.data;
              axios.get(service.baseURL+"/chooseCourse/getCanScoreCourse?stuId=" + row.stuId,
                  {
                    headers: {
                      Authorization: this.$store.state.token
                    }
                  })
                  .then((resp) => {
                    this.courseNames = resp.data.data;
                  })
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
    },
    openEditStu(row) {
      axios.get(service.baseURL+"/student/getByStuId?stuId=" + row.stuId,
          {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          })
          .then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.editFormVisible = true;
              this.editStuForm = resp.data.data//ä¸èƒ½æ¢ä¸“ä¸šï¼
              //   axios.get("http://localhost:8091/major/getAllMajorName",
              //       {
              //         headers: {
              //           Authorization: this.$store.state.token
              //         }
              //       })
              //       .then((resp) => {
              //         this.majorNames = resp.data.data;
              //         this.getClasses(this.editStuForm)
              //       })
              // } else {
              //   this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
    },
    editStu() {
      this.$refs.editStuFormRef.validate((valid) => {
        if (valid) {//å¦‚æœè¡¨å•çš„å¡«å†™åˆæ³•,å‘é€axiosè¯·æ±‚
          axios.put(service.baseURL+"/student/editByStuId", this.editStuForm,
              {
                headers: {
                  Authorization: this.$store.state.token
                }
              })
              .then((resp) => {
                if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
                  this.editFormVisible = false;//ç¼–è¾‘æˆåŠŸå…³é—­è¡¨å•
                  this.clearEditForm()
                  this.getStuList();//åˆ·æ–°è¡¨æ ¼
                  this.$message.success(resp.data.msg);
                } else {
                  this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
                }
              })
        } else {//è¡¨å•éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥
          return false;
        }
      })
    },
    openAddStu() {
      this.addFormVisible = true
      axios.get(service.baseURL+"/major/getAllMajorName",
          {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          })
          .then((resp) => {
            this.majorNames = resp.data.data;
          })
    },
    getStuList() {
      axios.get(service.baseURL+"/student/stuPageList?pageNum=" + this.pageNum +
          "&pageSize=" + this.pageSize + "&stuId=" + this.stuId +
          "&stuName=" + this.stuName + "&className=" + this.className,
          {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          }
      ).then((resp) => {
        if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
          this.stuList = resp.data.data.stuList
          this.total = resp.data.data.total
        } else {
          this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
        }
      })
    },
    handleCurrentChange(pageNum) {
      this.pageNum = pageNum
      this.getStuList()
    },
    handleSizeChange(pageSize) {
      this.pageSize = pageSize
      this.pageNum = 1
      this.getStuList()
    },
    clearAddForm() {//æ¯æ¬¡æ‰“å¼€å¼¹æ¡†åº”è¯¥æ¸…ç©ºæ•°æ®
      this.addStuForm = {}
      // setTimeout(()=>{
      //   this.addStuForm.classId=''
      // }, 100)
      this.$set(this.addStuForm,'classId','')
      this.$refs.addStuFormRef.clearValidate()
    },
    clearEditForm() {
      this.editStuForm = {}
      this.$refs.editStuFormRef.clearValidate()
    },
    clearScoreForm() {
      this.scoreStuForm = {}
      this.$refs.scoreStuFormRef.clearValidate()
    },
    addStu() {//æ·»åŠ å­¦ç”Ÿè¡¨å•ç¡®å®šè§¦å‘
      console.log(this.addStuForm.classId)
      this.$refs.addStuFormRef.validate((valid) => {
        if (valid) {//å¦‚æœè¡¨å•çš„å¡«å†™åˆæ³•,å‘é€axiosè¯·æ±‚
          axios.post(service.baseURL+"/student/add", {
                'admissionYear': this.addStuForm.admissionYear,
                'majorName': this.addStuForm.majorName,
                'classId': this.addStuForm.classId,
                'stuName': this.addStuForm.stuName,
                'stuIdCard': this.addStuForm.stuIdCard,
              },
              {
                headers: {
                  Authorization: this.$store.state.token
                }
              }
          ).then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.addFormVisible = false;//æ·»åŠ æˆåŠŸå…³é—­è¡¨å•
              this.clearAddForm()
              this.getStuList();//åˆ·æ–°è¡¨æ ¼
              this.$message.success(resp.data.msg);
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
        } else {//è¡¨å•éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥
          return false;
        }
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>

            {{
              (pageNum - 1) * pageSize + scope.$index + 1
            }}
          </template>
        </el-table-column>
        <el-table-column prop="teaId" label="ç­ä¸»ä»»ç¼–å·" sortable align="center" width="150"></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column prop="teaName" label="ç­ä¸»ä»»å§“å" align="center" sortable width="150"></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column prop="majorName" sortable align="center" width="200" label="ä¸“ä¸šåç§°"></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column prop="className" align="center" width="200" label="ç­çº§åç§°" sortable></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column prop="classYear" align="center" width="150" label="å¹´çº§" sortable></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column prop="handle" align="center" label="æ“ä½œ">
          <template slot-scope="scope">
            <el-button @click="openEditTea(scope.row)" type="warning" size="small">ç¼–è¾‘</el-button>
            <el-button @click="delTea(scope.row)" type="danger" size="small">åˆ é™¤</el-button>
          </template>
        </el-table-column>
      </el-table>
    </div>
    <div class="page">
      <el-pagination style="text-align: center" @current-change="handleCurrentChange"
                     @size-change="handleSizeChange"
                     :pager-count="11"
                     background
                     :current-page="pageNum"
                     :page-size="pageSize"
                     :page-sizes="[5, 10, 20, 50,100]"
                     layout="total, sizes, prev, pager, next, jumper"
                     :total="total">
      </el-pagination>
    </div>
    <!--æ·»åŠ ç­ä¸»ä»»è¡¨å•-->
    <div class="addTeaDialog">
      <el-dialog
          @close="clearAddForm"
          title="æ–°å¢ç­ä¸»ä»»"
          :visible.sync="addFormVisible">
        <el-form :model="addTeaForm" :rules="addRules" ref="addTeaFormRef">
          <el-form-item label="å¹´çº§" label-width="150px" prop="classYear">
            <el-select v-model="addTeaForm.classYear" placeholder="è¯·é€‰æ‹©å¹´çº§" clearable
                       @change="getClasses(addTeaForm)">
              <el-option
                  v-for="item in classYears"
                  :key="item.value"
                  :label="item.label"
                  :value="item.label">
              </el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="ä¸“ä¸š" label-width="150px" prop="majorName">
            <el-select v-model="addTeaForm.majorName" placeholder="è¯·é€‰æ‹©ä¸“ä¸š" clearable
                       @change="getClasses(addTeaForm)">
              <el-option
                  v-for="item in majorNames"
                  :key="item.majorId"
                  :label="item.majorName"
                  :value="item.majorName">
              </el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="ç­å·" label-width="150px" prop="classId">
            <el-select v-model="addTeaForm.classId" placeholder="è¯·é€‰æ‹©ç­å·" clearable id="selectClassId">
              <el-option
                  v-for="item in classNos"
                  :key="item.classId"
                  :label="item.classId.substring(6,7)"
                  :value="item.classId">
              </el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="ç­ä¸»ä»»å§“å" label-width="150px" prop="teaName">
            <el-input v-model="addTeaForm.teaName" autocomplete="off" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥ç­ä¸»ä»»å§“å"
                      clearable></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="èº«ä»½è¯" label-width="150px" prop="teaIdCard">
            <el-input v-model="addTeaForm.teaIdCard" autocomplete="off" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥èº«ä»½è¯" clearable></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-form>
        <div slot="footer" class="dialog-footer">
          <el-button @click="cancelAdd">å– æ¶ˆ</el-button>
          <el-button type="primary" @click="addTea">ç¡® å®š</el-button>
        </div>
      </el-dialog>

    </div>
    <!--ç¼–è¾‘ç­ä¸»ä»»è¡¨å•-->
    <div class="editStuDialog">
      <el-dialog
          @close="clearEditForm"
          title="ç¼–è¾‘ç­ä¸»ä»»"
          :visible.sync="editFormVisible">
        <el-form :model="editTeaForm" :rules="editRules" ref="editTeaFormRef">
          <el-form-item label="å¹´çº§" label-width="150px" prop="classYear" disabled>
            <el-input v-model="editTeaForm.classYear" autocomplete="off" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥ä¸“ä¸š" disabled></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="ä¸“ä¸š" label-width="150px" prop="majorName">
            <el-input v-model="editTeaForm.majorName" autocomplete="off" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥ä¸“ä¸š" disabled></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="ç­å·" label-width="150px" prop="classNo">
            <el-input v-model="editTeaForm.classNo" autocomplete="off" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥ç­å·" disabled></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="ç­ä¸»ä»»å§“å" label-width="150px" prop="teaName">
            <el-input v-model="editTeaForm.teaName" autocomplete="off" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥ç­ä¸»ä»»å§“å"
                      clearable></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="èº«ä»½è¯" label-width="150px" prop="teaIdCard">
            <el-input v-model="editTeaForm.teaIdCard" autocomplete="off" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥èº«ä»½è¯" disabled></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-form>
        <div slot="footer" class="dialog-footer">
          <el-button @click="cancelEdit">å– æ¶ˆ</el-button>
          <el-button type="primary" @click="editTea">ç¡® å®š</el-button>
        </div>
      </el-dialog>
    </div>
    <el-backtop :visibility-height=200>
      <div
          style="{
        height: 100%;
        width: 100%;
        background-color: #f2f5f6;
        box-shadow: 0 0 6px rgba(0,0,0, .30);
        text-align: center;
        line-height: 40px;
        color: #1989fa;
      }">

      </div>

<script>
import axios from "axios";
import service from "@/request";

export default {
  name: "AddTea",
  data() {
    let nowTime = new Date()
    let nowYear = nowTime.getFullYear();
    let maxYear = nowYear - 1//é»˜è®¤æ˜¯å½“å‰å¹´-1
    let startTime = new Date(nowYear + '-9-01 00:00:00')//ä»Šå¹´9æœˆä»½å¼€å­¦æ—¶é—´
    if (nowTime > startTime) {
      maxYear += 1
    }
    let checkTeaIdCard = (rule, value, callback) => {
      let reg = /^\d{6}(18|19|20)?\d{2}(0[1-9]|1[012])(0[1-9]|[12]\d|3[01])\d{3}(\d|[xX])$/;//æœªå¼€å‘
      if (!reg.test(value)) {
        return callback(new Error("èº«ä»½è¯æ ¼å¼é”™è¯¯"));
      }
      callback();
    };
    return {
      teaId: '',
      teaName: '',
      className: '',
      majorName: '',
      classNo: '',
      pageNum: 1,
      pageSize: 20,
      total: 0,
      teaList: [{
        teaId: '',
        teaName: '',
        majorName: '',
        classNo: ''
      }],

      addFormVisible: false,
      editFormVisible: false,
      addTeaForm: {
        teaIdCard: '',
        majorName: '',
        teaName: '',
        classId: ''
      },
      editTeaForm: {
        teaIdCard: '',
        majorName: '',
        teaName: ''
      },
      majorNames: [],
      classNos: [],
      addRules: {
        classYear: {required: true, message: "è¯·é€‰æ‹©å¹´çº§", trigger: "blur"},
        majorName: {required: true, message: "è¯·é€‰æ‹©ä¸“ä¸š", trigger: "blur"}, //éç©ºéªŒè¯
        classId: {required: true, message: "è¯·é€‰æ‹©ç­å·", trigger: "blur"}, //éç©ºéªŒè¯
        teaName: [
          {required: true, message: "è¯·è¾“å…¥ç­ä¸»ä»»å§“å", trigger: "blur"}, //éç©ºéªŒè¯
          {min: 2, max: 20, message: "å§“åé•¿åº¦ä¸º2åˆ°20ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦", trigger: "blur",}, //è§„åˆ™éªŒè¯
        ],
        teaIdCard: [
          {required: true, message: "è¯·è¾“å…¥èº«ä»½è¯", trigger: "blur"}, //éç©ºéªŒè¯
          {validator: checkTeaIdCard, trigger: "blur"},
        ]
      },
      editRules: {
        teaName: [
          {required: true, message: "è¯·è¾“å…¥ç­ä¸»ä»»å§“å", trigger: "blur"}, //éç©ºéªŒè¯
          {min: 2, max: 20, message: "å§“åé•¿åº¦ä¸º2åˆ°20ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦", trigger: "blur",}, //è§„åˆ™éªŒè¯
        ],
        // teaIdCard: [
        //   {required: true, message: "è¯·è¾“å…¥èº«ä»½è¯", trigger: "blur"}, //éç©ºéªŒè¯
        //   {validator: checkTeaIdCard, trigger: "blur"},
        // ]
      },
      classYears: [{value: '1', label: maxYear}, {value: '2', label: maxYear - 1},
        {value: '3', label: maxYear - 2}, {value: '4', label: maxYear - 3}],
    }
  },
  methods: {
    getClasses(teaForm) {
      this.$set(this.addTeaForm, 'classId', '')
      if ((teaForm.majorName != '' && teaForm.majorName != undefined) && (teaForm.classYear != '' && teaForm.classYear != undefined))
        axios.get(service.baseURL + "/class/getClassesByMajorName?majorName=" + teaForm.majorName + "&classYear=" + teaForm.classYear,
            {
              headers: {
                Authorization: this.$store.state.token
              }
            })
            .then((resp) => {
              if (resp.code = "20000") {
                this.classNos = resp.data.data
              }
            })
    },
    getTeaList() {//åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢ç­ä¸»ä»»è¡¨æ ¼
      axios.get(service.baseURL + "/teacher/teaPageList?pageNum=" + this.pageNum +
          "&pageSize=" + this.pageSize + "&teaId=" + this.teaId + "&teaName=" + this.teaName +
          "&className=" + this.className,
          {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          })
          .then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.teaList = resp.data.data.teaList
              this.total = resp.data.data.total
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
    },
    resetTeaList() {//åˆ·æ–°
      location.reload()
    },
    searchTeaList() {//å¾…æ¡ä»¶çš„åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢
      this.pageNum = 1
      this.getTeaList();
    },
    openAddTea() {//æ˜¾ç¤ºç­ä¸»ä»»æ·»åŠ è¡¨å•
      this.addFormVisible = true
      axios.get(service.baseURL + "/major/getAllMajorName",
          {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          })
          .then((resp) => {
            this.majorNames = resp.data.data;
          })
    },
    openEditTea(row) {//æ˜¾ç¤ºç­ä¸»ä»»ç¼–è¾‘è¡¨å•
      axios.get(service.baseURL + "/teacher/getTeaById?teaId=" + row.teaId,
          {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          })
          .then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.editFormVisible = true;
              this.editTeaForm = resp.data.data;
              // axios.get("http://localhost:8091/major/getAllMajorName",//ä¸èƒ½æ¢ä¸“ä¸š
              //     {
              //       headers: {
              //         Authorization: this.$store.state.token
              //       }
              //     })
              //     .then((resp) => {
              //       this.majorNames = resp.data.data;
              //     })
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
    },
    handleCurrentChange(pageNum) {//åˆ†é¡µ
      this.pageNum = pageNum
      this.getTeaList()
    },
    handleSizeChange(pageSize) {
      this.pageSize = pageSize
      this.pageNum = 1
      this.getTeaList()
    },
    clearAddForm() {//å…³é—­è¡¨å•æ—¶æ¸…ç©ºæ•°æ®
      this.addTeaForm = {}
      this.$refs.addTeaFormRef.clearValidate()
    },
    clearEditForm() {
      this.editTeaForm = {}
      this.$refs.editTeaFormRef.clearValidate()
    },
    cancelAdd() {//å–æ¶ˆå¢åŠ 
      this.addFormVisible = false
      this.classNos = []
      this.clearAddForm()
      this.$set(this.addTeaForm, 'classId', '')
      this.$message.info("å·²å–æ¶ˆæ–°å¢")
    },
    cancelEdit() {//å–æ¶ˆç¼–è¾‘
      this.editFormVisible = false
      this.clearEditForm()
      this.$message.info("å·²å–æ¶ˆç¼–è¾‘")
    },
    addTea() {//ç¡®å®šæ·»åŠ ç­ä¸»ä»»
      this.$refs.addTeaFormRef.validate((valid) => {
        if (valid) {//å¦‚æœè¡¨å•çš„å¡«å†™åˆæ³•,å‘é€axiosè¯·æ±‚
          axios.post(service.baseURL + "/teacher/add", {
                'classYear': this.addTeaForm.classYear,
                'majorName': this.addTeaForm.majorName,
                'classId': this.addTeaForm.classId,
                'teaName': this.addTeaForm.teaName,
                'teaIdCard': this.addTeaForm.teaIdCard,
              },
              {
                headers: {
                  Authorization: this.$store.state.token
                }
              }
          ).then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.addFormVisible = false
              this.clearAddForm()
              this.getTeaList()
              this.$message.success(resp.data.msg);
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
        } else {//è¡¨å•éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥
          return false;
        }
      })
    },
    delTea(row) {
      this.$confirm(`ç¡®è®¤åˆ é™¤ç­ä¸»ä»»ï¼š${row.teaName} ï¼Ÿ`, "æç¤º", {
        confirmButtonText: "ç¡®å®š",
        cancelButtonText: "å–æ¶ˆ",
        type: "warning",
        center: true,
      }).then(() => {
        axios.delete(service.baseURL + "/teacher/delTea?teaId=" + row.teaId,
            {
              headers: {
                Authorization: this.$store.state.token
              }
            })
            .then((resp) => {
              if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
                this.getTeaList();
                this.$message.success(resp.data.msg)
              } else {
                this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
              }
            })
      }).catch(() => {
        this.$message({
          type: "info",
          message: "å·²å–æ¶ˆåˆ é™¤",
        })
      })
    },
    editTea() {
      this.$refs.editTeaFormRef.validate((valid) => {
        if (valid) {//å¦‚æœè¡¨å•çš„å¡«å†™åˆæ³•,å‘é€axiosè¯·æ±‚
          axios.put(service.baseURL + "/teacher/editById", this.editTeaForm,
              {
                headers: {
                  Authorization: this.$store.state.token
                }
              }).then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.editFormVisible = false;//æ·»åŠ æˆåŠŸå…³é—­è¡¨å•
              this.clearEditForm()
              this.getTeaList();//åˆ·æ–°è¡¨æ ¼
              this.$message.success(resp.data.msg);
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
        } else {//è¡¨å•éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥
          return false;
        }
      })
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.searchTeaList()
  }
}
</script>

          <el-form-item label="å¹´çº§" label-width="150px" prop="classYear">
            <el-select v-model="classForm.classYear" placeholder="è¯·é€‰æ‹©å¹´çº§" clearable>

<script>
import axios from "axios";
import service from "@/request";
export default {
  name: "ClassManage",
  data() {
    let nowTime = new Date()
    let nowYear = nowTime.getFullYear();
    let maxYear = nowYear - 1//é»˜è®¤æ˜¯å½“å‰å¹´-1
    let startTime = new Date(nowYear + '-9-01 00:00:00')//ä»Šå¹´9æœˆä»½å¼€å­¦æ—¶é—´
    if (nowTime > startTime) {
      maxYear += 1
    }
    return {
      className: '',
      teaName: '',
      classList: [{
        classId: '',
        className: '',
        majorName: '',
        stuTotal: 0,
        classYear: ''
      }],
      pageNum: 1,
      pageSize: 20,
      total: 0,
      formVisible: false,
      classForm: {
        majorName: '',
        classYear: ''
      },
      rules: {
        classYear: {required: true, message: "è¯·é€‰æ‹©å¹´çº§", trigger: "blur"},
        majorName: {required: true, message: "è¯·é€‰æ‹©ä¸“ä¸š", trigger: "blur"}
      },
      majorNames: [],
      classYears: [{value: '1', label: maxYear}, {value: '2', label: maxYear - 1},
        {value: '3', label: maxYear - 2}, {value: '4', label: maxYear - 3}],
    }
  },
  methods: {
    getClassList() {
      axios.get(service.baseURL+"/class/classPageList?pageNum=" + this.pageNum +
          "&pageSize=" + this.pageSize + "&className=" + this.className + "&teaName=" + this.teaName, {
        headers: {
          Authorization: this.$store.state.token
        }
      })
          .then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.classList = resp.data.data.classList
              this.total = resp.data.data.total
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
    },
    searchClassList() {
      this.pageNum = 1
      this.getClassList();
    },
    resetClassList() {
      location.reload()
    },
    openClassForm() {
      this.formVisible = true
      axios.get(service.baseURL+"/major/getAllMajorName", {
        headers: {
          Authorization: this.$store.state.token
        }
      }).then((resp) => {
        this.majorNames = resp.data.data;
      })
    },
    delClass(row) {
      //æœ‰ç­ä¸»ä»»ï¼Œæ— æ³•åˆ é™¤
      if (row.stuTotal > 0) {
        this.$message.info("è¯¥ç­çº§è¿˜æœ‰å­¦ç”Ÿï¼Œæ— æ³•åˆ é™¤")
      }
      if (row.teaName != '' && row.teaName != null) {
        this.$message.info("è¯¥ç­çº§è¿˜æœ‰ç­ä¸»ä»»ï¼Œæ— æ³•åˆ é™¤")
      } else
        this.$confirm(`ç¡®è®¤åˆ é™¤ç­çº§ï¼š${row.className} ï¼Ÿ`, "æç¤º", {
          confirmButtonText: "ç¡®å®š",
          cancelButtonText: "å–æ¶ˆ",
          type: "warning",
          center: true,
        }).then(() => {
          axios.delete(service.baseURL+"/class/delClassById?classId=" + row.classId, {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          }).then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.$message.success(resp.data.msg)
              this.getClassList();
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
        }).catch(() => {
          this.$message({
            type: "info",
            message: "å·²å–æ¶ˆåˆ é™¤",
          })
        });
    },
    handleCurrentChange(pageNum) {
      this.pageNum = pageNum
      this.getClassList()
    },
    handleSizeChange(pageSize) {
      this.pageSize = pageSize
      this.pageNum = 1
      this.getClassList()
    },
    clearForm() {
      this.classForm = {}
      this.$refs.classFormRef.clearValidate()
    },
    cancelForm() {
      this.formVisible = false
      this.clearForm()
      this.$message.info("å·²å–æ¶ˆæ–°å¢")
    },
    saveClass() {
      this.$refs.classFormRef.validate((valid) => {
        if (valid) {//å¦‚æœè¡¨å•çš„å¡«å†™åˆæ³•,å‘é€axiosè¯·æ±‚
          axios.post(service.baseURL+"/class/add", {
                'majorName': this.classForm.majorName,
                'classYear': this.classForm.classYear
              }, {
                headers: {
                  Authorization: this.$store.state.token
                }
              }
          ).then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.formVisible = false
              this.clearForm()
              this.getClassList()
              this.$message.success(resp.data.msg);
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
        } else {//è¡¨å•éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥
          return false;
        }
      })
    }
  },

<script>
import axios from "axios";
import service from "@/request";

export default {
  name: "CourseManage",
  data() {
    return {
      coursePeriod: '',
      courseName: '',
      majorName: '',
      pageNum: 1,
      pageSize: 50,
      total: 0,
      addFormVisible: false,
      editFormVisible: false,
      courseList: [{
        courseId: '',
        courseName: '',
        majorName: '',
        coursePeriod: '',
        stuChooseNum: 0,
        ifDegree: '',
      }],
      addCourseForm: {},
      editCourseForm: {},
      addRules: {
        majorName: {required: true, message: "è¯·é€‰æ‹©ä¸“ä¸š", trigger: "blur"},//éç©ºéªŒè¯,
        coursePeriod: {required: true, message: "è¯·é€‰æ‹©å¼€è¯¾æ—¶æœŸ", trigger: "blur"},
        courseName: [{required: true, message: "è¯·è¾“å…¥è¯¾ç¨‹å", trigger: "blur"},
          {min: 2, max: 20, message: "è¯¾ç¨‹é•¿åº¦ä¸º2åˆ°20ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦", trigger: "blur"}],
      },
      editRules: {
        coursePeriod: {required: true, message: "è¯·é€‰æ‹©å¼€è¯¾æ—¶æœŸ", trigger: "blur"},
        courseName: [{required: true, message: "è¯·è¾“å…¥è¯¾ç¨‹å", trigger: "blur"},
          {min: 2, max: 20, message: "è¯¾ç¨‹åé•¿åº¦ä¸º2åˆ°20ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦", trigger: "blur"}],
      },
      coursePeriods: [
        {value: '1', label: 'å¤§ä¸€ä¸Š'},
        {value: '2', label: 'å¤§ä¸€ä¸‹'},
        {value: '3', label: 'å¤§äºŒä¸Š'},
        {value: '4', label: 'å¤§äºŒä¸‹'},
        {value: '5', label: 'å¤§ä¸‰ä¸Š'},
        {value: '6', label: 'å¤§ä¸‰ä¸‹'},
        {value: '7', label: 'å¤§å››ä¸Š'},
        {value: '8', label: 'å¤§å››ä¸‹'},
      ],
      majorNames: []
    }
  },
  methods: {
    getCourseList() {
      axios.get(service.baseURL + "/course/coursePageList?pageNum=" + this.pageNum +
          "&pageSize=" + this.pageSize + "&courseName=" + this.courseName + "&majorName=" +
          this.majorName + "&coursePeriod=" + this.coursePeriod, {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          }
      ).then((resp) => {
        if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
          this.courseList = resp.data.data.courseList
          this.total = resp.data.data.total
        } else {
          this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
        }
      })
    },
    searchCourseList() {
      this.pageNum = 1
      this.getCourseList();
    },
    resetCourseList() {
      location.reload()
    },
    openAddCourseForm() {
      this.addFormVisible = true
      axios.get(service.baseURL + "/major/getAllMajorName", {
        headers: {
          Authorization: this.$store.state.token
        }
      }).then((resp) => {
        this.majorNames = resp.data.data;
      })
    },
    openEditCourseForm(row) {
      if (row.stuChooseNum > 0) {
        this.$message.info("è¿˜æœ‰å­¦ç”Ÿæœ‰è¯¥è¯¾,æ— æ³•ç¼–è¾‘")
      } else
        axios.get(service.baseURL + "/course/getCourseById?courseId=" + row.courseId, {
          headers: {
            Authorization: this.$store.state.token
          }
        }).then((resp) => {
          if (resp.data.code = "20000") {
            this.editFormVisible = true
            // axios.get("http://localhost:8091/major/getAllMajorName", {//è¯¾ç¨‹ä¸èƒ½æ¢ä¸“ä¸š
            //   headers: {
            //     Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            //   }
            // })//è·å–æ‰€æœ‰ä¸“ä¸š
            //     .then((resp) => {
            //       this.majorNames = resp.data.data;
            //     })
            this.editCourseForm = resp.data.data//æ¸²æŸ“ç¼–è¾‘è¡¨å•
          } else {
            this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
          }
        })
    },
    delCourse(row) {
      if (row.stuChooseNum > 0) {
        this.$message.info("è¿˜æœ‰å­¦ç”Ÿæœ‰è¯¥è¯¾ï¼Œæ— æ³•åˆ é™¤")
      } else
        this.$confirm(`ç¡®è®¤åˆ é™¤è¯¾ç¨‹ï¼š${row.courseName} ï¼Ÿ`, "æç¤º", {
          confirmButtonText: "ç¡®å®š",
          cancelButtonText: "å–æ¶ˆ",
          type: "warning",
          center: true,
        }).then(() => {
          axios.delete(service.baseURL + "/course/delCourseById?courseId=" + row.courseId, {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          })
              .then((resp) => {
                if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
                  this.getCourseList()
                  this.$message.success(resp.data.msg)
                } else {
                  this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
                }
              })
        }).catch(() => {
          this.$message({
            type: "info",
            message: "å·²å–æ¶ˆåˆ é™¤"
          })
        });
    },
    handleCurrentChange(pageNum) {
      this.pageNum = pageNum
      this.getCourseList()
    },
    handleSizeChange(pageSize) {
      this.pageSize = pageSize
      this.pageNum = 1
      this.getCourseList()
    },
    clearAddForm() {
      this.addCourseForm = {}
      this.$refs.addFormRef.clearValidate()
    },
    clearEditForm() {
      this.addCourseForm = {}
      this.$refs.editFormRef.clearValidate()
    },

    cancelAddForm() {
      this.addFormVisible = false
      this.$message.info("å·²å–æ¶ˆæ–°å¢")
    },
    cancelEditForm() {
      this.editFormVisible = false
      this.$message.info("å·²å–æ¶ˆç¼–è¾‘")
    },
    addCourse() {
      this.$refs.addFormRef.validate((valid) => {
        if (valid) {//å¦‚æœè¡¨å•çš„å¡«å†™åˆæ³•,å‘é€axiosè¯·æ±‚
          axios.post(service.baseURL + "/course/add", {
                'coursePeriod': this.addCourseForm.coursePeriod,
                'majorName': this.addCourseForm.majorName,
                'courseName': this.addCourseForm.courseName,
                'ifDegree': this.addCourseForm.ifDegree
              }, {
                headers: {
                  Authorization: this.$store.state.token
                }
              }
          ).then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.addFormVisible = false;//æ·»åŠ æˆåŠŸå…³é—­è¡¨å•
              this.clearAddForm()
              this.getCourseList();//åˆ·æ–°è¡¨æ ¼
              this.$message.success(resp.data.msg);
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
        } else {//è¡¨å•éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥
          return false;
        }
      })
    },
    editCourse() {
      this.$refs.editFormRef.validate((valid) => {
        if (valid) {//å¦‚æœè¡¨å•çš„å¡«å†™åˆæ³•,å‘é€axiosè¯·æ±‚
          axios.put(service.baseURL + "/course/edit", {
                'courseId': this.editCourseForm.courseId,
                'coursePeriod': this.editCourseForm.coursePeriod,
                'majorName': this.editCourseForm.majorName,
                'courseName': this.editCourseForm.courseName,
                'ifDegree': this.editCourseForm.ifDegree
              }, {
                headers: {
                  Authorization: this.$store.state.token
                }
              }
          ).then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.editFormVisible = false;//ç¼–è¾‘æˆåŠŸå…³é—­è¡¨å•
              this.clearEditForm()
              this.getCourseList();//åˆ·æ–°è¡¨æ ¼
              this.$message.success(resp.data.msg);
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
        } else {//è¡¨å•éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥
          return false;
        }
      })
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.getCourseList()
  }
}
</script>

<script>
import axios from "axios";
import service from "@/request";

export default {
  name: "MajorManage",
  data() {
    return {
      majorName: '',
      majorList: [{
        majorId: '',
        majorName: '',
        classTotal: 0,
        courseTotal: 0,
      }],
      title: '',
      pageNum: 1,
      pageSize: 10,
      total: 0,
      formVisible: false,
      majorForm: {
        majorId: '',
        majorName: '',
      },
      rules: {
        majorName: [{required: true, message: "è¯·è¾“å…¥ä¸“ä¸š", trigger: "blur"},//éç©ºéªŒè¯,
          {min: 2, max: 20, message: "ä¸“ä¸šåé•¿åº¦ä¸º2åˆ°20ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦", trigger: "blur"}],
      },
    }
  },
  methods: {
    getMajorList() {
      axios.get(service.baseURL + "/major/majorPageList?pageNum=" + this.pageNum +
          "&pageSize=" + this.pageSize + "&majorName=" + this.majorName, {
        headers: {
          Authorization: this.$store.state.token
        }
      }).then((resp) => {
        if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
          this.majorList = resp.data.data.majorList
          this.total = resp.data.data.total
        } else {
          this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
        }
      })
    },
    searchMajorList() {
      this.pageNum = 1
      this.getMajorList();
    }
    ,
    resetMajorList() {
      location.reload()
    },
    openMajorForm(row) {
      if (row == null) {
        this.formVisible = true
        this.title = 'æ–°å¢ä¸“ä¸š'
      } else {
        if (row.classTotal > 0 || row.courseTotal > 0) {
          this.$message.info("è¯¥ä¸“ä¸šè¿˜æœ‰ç­çº§æˆ–è¯¾ç¨‹ï¼Œæ— æ³•ç¼–è¾‘")
        } else {
          this.formVisible = true
          this.title = 'ç¼–è¾‘ä¸“ä¸š'
          axios.get(service.baseURL + "/major/getByMajorId?majorId=" + row.majorId, {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          })
              .then((resp) => {
                if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
                  this.majorForm = resp.data.data
                } else {
                  this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
                }
              })
        }
      }
    },
    delMajor(row) {
      if (row.classTotal > 0 || row.courseTotal > 0) {
        this.$message.info("è¯¥ä¸“ä¸šè¿˜æœ‰ç­çº§æˆ–è¯¾ç¨‹æ— æ³•ï¼Œæ— æ³•åˆ é™¤")
      } else
        this.$confirm(`ç¡®è®¤åˆ é™¤ä¸“ä¸šï¼š${row.majorName} ï¼Ÿ`, "æç¤º", {
          confirmButtonText: "ç¡®å®š",
          cancelButtonText: "å–æ¶ˆ",
          type: "warning",
          center: true,
        }).then(() => {
          axios.delete(service.baseURL + "/major/delById?majorId=" + row.majorId, {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          })
              .then((resp) => {
                if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
                  this.getMajorList();
                  this.$message.success(resp.data.msg)
                } else {
                  this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
                }
              })
        }).catch(() => {
          this.$message({
            type: "info",
            message: "å·²å–æ¶ˆåˆ é™¤",
          });
        });
    },
    handleCurrentChange(pageNum) {
      this.pageNum = pageNum
      this.getMajorList()
    },
    handleSizeChange(pageSize) {
      this.pageSize = pageSize
      this.pageNum = 1
      this.getMajorList()
    },
    clearForm() {
      this.majorForm = {}
      this.$refs.majorFormRef.clearValidate()
    },
    cancelForm(title) {
      this.formVisible = false
      this.clearForm()
      if (title == 'æ–°å¢ä¸“ä¸š') {
        this.$message.info("å·²å–æ¶ˆæ–°å¢")
      } else if (title == 'ç¼–è¾‘ä¸“ä¸š') {
        this.$message.info("å·²å–æ¶ˆç¼–è¾‘")
      }
    },
    saveMajor(title) {
      this.$refs.majorFormRef.validate((valid) => {
        if (valid && title == 'æ–°å¢ä¸“ä¸š') {//å¦‚æœè¡¨å•çš„å¡«å†™åˆæ³•,å‘é€axiosè¯·æ±‚
          axios.post(service.baseURL + "/major/add", {
                'majorName': this.majorForm.majorName,
              }, {
                headers: {
                  Authorization: this.$store.state.token
                }
              }
          ).then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.formVisible = false;//æ·»åŠ æˆåŠŸå…³é—­è¡¨å•
              this.clearForm()
              this.getMajorList();//åˆ·æ–°è¡¨æ ¼
              this.$message.success(resp.data.msg);
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
        } else if (valid && title == 'ç¼–è¾‘ä¸“ä¸š') {
          axios.put(service.baseURL + "/major/edit", {
            'majorName': this.majorForm.majorName,
            'majorId': this.majorForm.majorId
          }, {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          }).then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.formVisible = false;//æ·»åŠ æˆåŠŸå…³é—­è¡¨å•
              this.clearForm()
              this.getMajorList();//åˆ·æ–°è¡¨æ ¼
              this.$message.success(resp.data.msg);
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
        } else {//è¡¨å•éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥
          return false;
        }
      })
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.getMajorList();
  }
}
</script>

<script>
import axios from "axios";
import service from "@/request";
export default {
  stuName: "MajorScore",
  data() {
    let nowTime = new Date()
    let nowYear = nowTime.getFullYear();
    let maxYear = nowYear - 1//é»˜è®¤æ˜¯å½“å‰å¹´-1
    let startTime = new Date(nowYear + '-9-01 00:00:00')//ä»Šå¹´9æœˆä»½å¼€å­¦æ—¶é—´
    if (nowTime > startTime) {
      maxYear += 1
    }
    return {
      majors:[],
      major:'',
      admissionYear:'',
      //æŸ¥è¯¢æœ¬ä¸“ä¸šï¼Œæœ¬å¹´çº§çš„æ‰€æœ‰è¯¾ç¨‹
      courseList: [],
      stuScoreList: [
        {courseScore: []},
        {courseScore: []},
        {courseScore: []},
        {courseScore: []},
      ],

      pageNum: 1,
      pageSize: 50,
      stuId: '',
      stuName: '',
      className: '',
      total: 0,
      classYears: [{value: '1', label: maxYear}, {value: '2', label: maxYear - 1},
        {value: '3', label: maxYear - 2}, {value: '4', label: maxYear - 3}],

    }
  },
  created() {
    this.getMajors()
  },
  methods: {
    getStuScoreList() {
      axios.get(service.baseURL+"/score/getStuScoreList?admissionYearMajor=" + this.admissionYear +
          this.major + "&stuName=" + this.stuName+"&pageSize="+this.pageSize+"&pageNum="+this.pageNum
          +"&className="+this.className, {
        headers: {
          Authorization: this.$store.state.token
        }
      }).then((resp => {
        if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
          this.stuScoreList = resp.data.data.stuScoreList
          this.total=resp.data.data.total
        }
      }))
    },
    getCourseList() {//æ¸²æŸ“è¡¨å¤´
      axios.get(service.baseURL+"/course/getScoreCourse?majorId=" + this.major +
          "&admissionYear=" + this.admissionYear, {
        headers: {
          Authorization: this.$store.state.token
        }
      }).then((resp => {
        if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
          this.courseList = resp.data.data
        }
      }))
    },
    getMajors(){
      axios.get(service.baseURL+'/major/getAllMajorName',{
        headers: {
          Authorization: this.$store.state.token
        }
      }).then((resp)=>{
        this.majors=resp.data.data
      })
    },
    resetStuList() {
      location.reload();
    },
    searchStuList() {
      if ((this.major!=''&&this.major!=null)&&(this.admissionYear!=''&&this.admissionYear!=null)){
        this.pageNum = 1
        this.getCourseList()
        this.getStuScoreList()
      }
    },

    handleCurrentChange(pageNum) {
      this.pageNum = pageNum
      this.getStuScoreList()
    },
    handleSizeChange(pageSize) {
      this.pageSize = pageSize
      this.pageNum = 1
      this.getStuScoreList()
    },
  }
}
</script>

<script>

import service from "@/request";
export default {
  name: "AdminChooseCourse",
  methods: {
    delAdmin() {
      this.$confirm(`ç¡®è®¤æ³¨é”€è´¦å·ï¼Ÿ`, "æç¤º", {
        confirmButtonText: "ç¡®å®š",
        cancelButtonText: "å–æ¶ˆ",
        type: "warning",
        center: true,
      }).then(() => {
        axios.delete(service.baseURL+"/admin/delAdmin?adminId=" + this.$store.state.userInfo.adminId,
            {
              headers: {
                Authorization: this.$store.state.token
              }
            })
            .then((resp) => {
              if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
                this.$store.commit('REMOVE_INFO')
                this.$router.push('/login')
                this.$message.success(resp.data.msg)
              } else {
                this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
              }
            })
      }).catch(() => {
        this.$message({
          type: "info",
          message: "å·²å–æ¶ˆæ³¨é”€",
        })
      })
    }
  }
}

                                                                                                      <template>
  <div class="myInfo">
    <el-card class="admin-card">
      <div slot="header" align="center" class="header">
        <span>ç­ä¸»ä»»ä¸ªäººèµ„æ–™</span>
      </div>
      <div class="content">
        <div class="edit">
          <el-button type="primary" round style="float: right" @click="openEditTea">ç¼–è¾‘
          </el-button>
        </div>
        <el-descriptions title="" border :column="column">
          <el-descriptions-item label="èº«ä»½">ç­ä¸»ä»»</el-descriptions-item>
          <el-descriptions-item label="ç­ä¸»ä»»ç¼–å·">{{ userInfo.teaId }}</el-descriptions-item>
          <el-descriptions-item label="ç­ä¸»ä»»å§“å">{{ userInfo.teaName }}</el-descriptions-item>
          <el-descriptions-item label="å¯†ç ">{{ userInfo.teaPwd }}</el-descriptions-item>
          <el-descriptions-item label="å¹´çº§">{{ userInfo.classYear }}</el-descriptions-item>
          <el-descriptions-item label="ä¸“ä¸š">{{ userInfo.majorName }}</el-descriptions-item>
          <el-descriptions-item label="ç­çº§">{{ userInfo.className }}</el-descriptions-item>
          <el-descriptions-item label="èº«ä»½è¯">{{ userInfo.teaIdCard }}</el-descriptions-item>
          <el-descriptions-item label="æ³¨å†Œæ—¶é—´">{{ userInfo.createTime }}</el-descriptions-item>
        </el-descriptions>
      </div>
    </el-card>
    <!--    ç¼–è¾‘ç­ä¸»ä»»è¡¨å•-->
    <div class="editDialog">
      <el-dialog
          @close="clearEditForm"
          title="ç¼–è¾‘ç­ä¸»ä»»"
          :visible.sync="editFormVisible">
        <el-form :model="editForm" :rules="editRules" ref="editRef">
          <el-form-item label="è´¦å·" label-width="150px" prop="teaId">
            <el-input v-model="editForm.teaId" disabled></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="ç­ä¸»ä»»å§“å" label-width="150px" prop="teaName">
            <el-input v-model="editForm.teaName" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥ç­ä¸»ä»»å§“å"></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="å¯†ç " label-width="150px" prop="teaPwd">
            <el-input v-model="editForm.teaPwd" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥å¯†ç " autocomplete="off" clearable
                      type="password"></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="å¯†ç " label-width="150px" prop="teaPwd2">
            <el-input v-model="editForm.teaPwd2" placeholder="è¯·å†æ¬¡è¾“å…¥ç›¸åŒå¯†ç " autocomplete="off" clearable
                      type="password"></el-input>
          </el-form-item>

<script>

import axios from "axios";
import service from "@/request";

export default {
  data() {
    let validateCheckPwd = (rule, value, callback) => {
      if (value === '') {
        callback(new Error('è¯·å†æ¬¡è¾“å…¥ç›¸åŒå¯†ç '));
      } else if (value !== this.editForm.teaPwd) {
        callback(new Error('ä¸¤æ¬¡è¾“å…¥å¯†ç ä¸ä¸€è‡´!'));
      } else {
        callback();
      }
    };
    return {
      column: 2,
      editFormVisible: false,
      userInfo: {
        classYear: '',
        teaName: '',
        teaPwd: '',
        createTime: '',
      },
      editForm: {
        teaId: '',
        teaName: '',
        teaPwd: "",
        teaPwd2: "",
      },
      editRules: {
        teaName: [{required: true, message: "è¯·è¾“å…¥ç­ä¸»ä»»å§“å", trigger: "blur"}, //éç©ºéªŒè¯
          {min: 2, max: 20, message: 'å§“åé•¿åº¦ä¸º2åˆ°20ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur'}
        ],
        teaPwd: [
          {required: true, message: 'å¯†ç ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º', trigger: 'blur'},
          {min: 6, max: 16, message: 'å¯†ç é•¿åº¦ä¸º6åˆ°16ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur'}
        ],
        teaPwd2: [
          {required: true, message: 'å¯†ç ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º', trigger: 'blur'},
          {validator: validateCheckPwd, trigger: 'blur'}
        ],
      }
    }
  },

  created() {
    this.getTeaInfo()
  },
  methods: {
    getTeaInfo() {
      axios.get(service.baseURL + "/teacher/getTeaById?teaId=" + this.$store.state.userInfo.teaId,
          {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          })
          .then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.userInfo = resp.data.data;
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
    },
    openEditTea() {
      this.editForm.teaId = this.userInfo.teaId
      this.editForm.teaName = this.userInfo.teaName
      this.editFormVisible = true
    },
    clearEditForm() {
      this.editForm = {}
      this.$set(this.editForm, 'teaName', '')
      this.$refs.editRef.clearValidate()
    },
    cancelEdit() {
      this.editFormVisible = false
      this.clearEditForm()
      this.$message.info("å·²å–æ¶ˆç¼–è¾‘")
    },
    editTea() {
      this.$refs.editRef.validate((valid) => {
        if (valid) {//å¦‚æœè¡¨å•çš„å¡«å†™åˆæ³•,å‘é€axiosè¯·æ±‚
          axios.put(service.baseURL + "/teacher/editById", this.editForm,
              {
                headers: {
                  Authorization: this.$store.state.token
                }
              })
              .then((resp) => {

          @close="clearMsgForm"

<script>
import axios from "axios";
import service from "@/request";

export default {
  name: "ClassScore",
  data() {
    return {
      msgRules: {
        msgContent: [
          {required: true, message: "æ¶ˆæ¯ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º", trigger: "blur"},
          {min: 1, max: 255, message: "æ¶ˆæ¯é•¿åº¦ä¸º1åˆ°255ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦", trigger: "blur"},
        ]
      },
      msgForm: {
        msgContent: ''
      },
      msgFormVisible: false,
      //æŸ¥è¯¢æœ¬ä¸“ä¸šï¼Œæœ¬å¹´çº§çš„æ‰€æœ‰è¯¾ç¨‹
      courseList: [],
      stuScoreList: [
        {courseScore: []},
        {courseScore: []},
        {courseScore: []},
        {courseScore: []},
      ],

      pageNum: 1,
      pageSize: 20,
      stuId: '',
      stuName: '',
      className: '',
      total: 0,

    }
  },
  created() {
    this.getCourseList()
    this.getStuScoreList()
  },
  methods: {

    msgToStu(row) {
      this.$refs.msgRef.validate((valid) => {
        if (valid) {
          axios.post(service.baseURL + "/stuMessage/addMsg", {
            stuId: this.msgForm.stuId,
            stuName: this.msgForm.stuName,
            teaId: this.$store.state.userInfo.teaId,
            msgContent: this.msgForm.msgContent
          }, {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          })
          axios.post(service.baseURL + "/teaMessage/addMsg", {
            stuId: this.msgForm.stuId,
            stuName: this.msgForm.stuName,
            teaId: this.$store.state.userInfo.teaId,
            msgContent: this.msgForm.msgContent
          }, {
            headers: {
              Authorization: this.$store.state.token
            }
          }).then((resp) => {
            if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
              this.msgFormVisible = false;//ç¼–è¾‘æˆåŠŸå…³é—­è¡¨å•
              this.clearMsgForm()
              this.$message.success(resp.data.msg)
            } else {
              this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
            }
          })
        } else {
          return false
        }
      })
    },
    cancelMsg() {
      this.msgFormVisible = false
      this.clearMsgForm()
      this.$message.info("å·²å–æ¶ˆå‘æ¶ˆæ¯")
    },
    clearMsgForm() {
      this.msgForm = {}
      this.$set(this.msgForm, 'msgContent', '')
      this.$refs.msgRef.clearValidate()
    },
    openMessage(row) {
      this.msgFormVisible = true
      this.msgForm.stuId = row.stuId
      this.msgForm.stuName = row.stuName
    },
    getStuScoreList() {
      axios.get(service.baseURL + "/score/getStuScoreList?admissionYearMajor=" + this.$store.state.userInfo.classYear +
          this.$store.state.userInfo.majorId + "&stuName=" + this.stuName + "&pageSize=" + this.pageSize + "&pageNum=" + this.pageNum
          + "&stuId=" + this.stuId + "&className=" + this.$store.state.userInfo.classNo, {
        headers: {
          Authorization: this.$store.state.token
        }
      }).then((resp => {
        if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
          this.stuScoreList = resp.data.data.stuScoreList
          this.total = resp.data.data.total
        }
      }))
    },
    getCourseList() {//æ¸²æŸ“è¡¨å¤´
      axios.get(service.baseURL + "/course/getScoreCourse?majorId=" + this.$store.state.userInfo.majorId +
          "&admissionYear=" + this.$store.state.userInfo.classYear, {
        headers: {
          Authorization: this.$store.state.token
        }
      }).then((resp => {
        if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
          this.courseList = resp.data.data
        }
      }))
    },
    resetStuList() {
      location.reload();
    },
    searchStuList() {
      this.pageNum = 1
      this.getStuScoreList()
    },
    handleCurrentChange(pageNum) {
      this.pageNum = pageNum
      this.getStuScoreList()
    },
    handleSizeChange(pageSize) {
      this.pageSize = pageSize
      this.pageNum = 1
      this.getStuScoreList()
    },
  }
}
</script>

export default {
  name: "HasSendMsg",

    return {
      stuName:'',
      msgList: [
        {
          msgTime: '',
          msgId: ''
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  methods: {
    searchMsg(){
      this.getMsgList()
    },
    resetMsgList(){
      location.reload()
    },
    getMsgList() {
      axios.get(service.baseURL + "/teaMessage/getMsgsByTeaId?teaId=" +
          this.$store.state.userInfo.teaId+"&stuName="+this.stuName, {
        headers: {
          Authorization: this.$store.state.token
        }
      }).then((resp => {
        if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
          this.msgList = resp.data.data
        }
      }))
    },
    delMsg(item) {
      this.$confirm(`ç¡®è®¤åˆ é™¤è¯¥æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Ÿ`, "æç¤º", {
        confirmButtonText: "ç¡®å®š",
        cancelButtonText: "å–æ¶ˆ",
        type: "warning",
        center: true,
      }).then(() => {
        axios.delete(service.baseURL + "/teaMessage/delById?msgId=" + item.msgId, {
          headers: {
            Authorization: this.$store.state.token
          }
        }).then((resp) => {
          if (resp.data.code == '20000') {
            this.getMsgList()
            this.$message.success(resp.data.msg)
          } else {
            this.$message.error(resp.data.msg)
          }
        }).catch(() => {
          this.$message({
            type: "info",
            message: "å·²å–æ¶ˆåˆ é™¤",
          })
        })
      })
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.getMsgList()
  }
}
